citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
Although the facility does have an enrichment schedule in place for each of their avian species that provides appropriate
enrichment within the enclosures, the facility did not have a documented environmental enhancement plan to promote
psychological well-being of their avian species as required. The facility must develop, document and follow a species
appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must
be approved by the attending veterinarian, and at a minimum must address social grouping, environmental enrichment,
special considerations, restraint, and exemptions to the plan.
Correct by 9/14/23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
Although the facility does have an enrichment schedule in place for each of their avian species that provides appropriate 
enrichment within the enclosures, the facility did not have a documented environmental enhancement plan to promote 
psychological well-being of their avian species as required. The facility must develop, document and follow a species 
appropriate plan for environment enhancement adequate to promote the psychological well-being of birds. The plan must 
be approved by the attending veterinarian, and at a minimum must address social grouping, environmental enrichment, 
special considerations, restraint, and exemptions to the plan. 
Correct by 9/14/23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
